name: Marble race connections
description:
Instructions: 

- Click the pipes to rotate them (if the marble is not rolling).

- Spacebar releases the marble (if it's not rolling), or resets the marble (if it's rolling). Alternatively, click the starting pipe (green when hovered) for the same functionality.

- Try to go for a high score! The pipes are randomly placed each time the ball reaches the end. 

Known issues:

- It's possible the marble bounces backwards on tricky physics defying segments, it usually reaches the end after a few tries. 

Credits:

- Made with Unity, ver. 2021.3.15f1

- SFX by Brackey's (2D mega pack)

- All else made by me

Feel free to post feedback if you play my game, it's my first game made with a game engine :)
